import { useState } from "react" const containerStyle = { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap:'16px' } const starContainerStyle ={ display: 'flex', } const starStyle = { width: '48px', height: '48px' , display:'block' , cursor:'pointer' } export default function StarRating({maxRating = 5, color = "#fcc419" , size="48"}){ const [rating,setRating] = useState(0) const [tempRating,setTempRating] = useState(0) function handleRating(rating){ setRating(rating) } const textStyle = { lineHeight: "1", margin:"0", color,fontSize: `${size / 1.5}px`, } return
{Array.from({length:maxRating},(_,i)=>(= i+1 : rating >= i+1} onRate={()=>handleRating(i + 1)} onHoverIn={()=>setTempRating(i+1) } onHoverOut={()=>setTempRating(0) } key={i}/> ))}

{tempRating ? tempRating : rating || ""}

} function Star({onRate, isFull, onHoverIn, onHoverOut}){ return ( {isFull ? : } ) } /* FULL STAR EMPTY STAR */
